metadata.title: CVE-2025-1072 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: A Denial of Service (DoS) issue has been discovered in GitLab CE/EEaffecting all versions starting from 7.14.1 prior to 17.3.7, 17.4 prior to17.4.4, and 17.5 prior to 17.5.2. A denial of service could occur uponimporting maliciously crafted content using the Fogbugz importer.

criterions.comment: gitlab: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
